About Services References Contact

Local help for your peace of mind

If you are a foreigner who is planning to open a business in Thailand you will quickly notice the language and culture barrier which easily can cause miscommunication. It’s important to know how to talk and negotiate with Thai people to ensure a successful business relationship.

You will also realize it is difficult to find the correct information about the rules in Thailand.  This is mainly because the laws change so fast and it’s not easy to find the latest updates. We are here to make sure that you won’t experience any unexpected costs or setbacks and that everything runs smoothly.

Services

Translation & Interpretation

×

Translation & Interpretation

I have many years of experience in translating and interpretation which results in a smooth and clear communication. From translating blockbuster movies for Netflix to handling legal documents and contracts. I have a wide range of interpersonal communication skills and deep understanding of English and Thai language. This means I not only translate word for word but I know how to deal with people in every situation.

Administration

×

Administration

Administration is one of my biggest services since this contains a very big range of tasks within a business or private life. As a virtual assistant, I am your receptionist, recruiter, bookkeeper, social media manager etc. all in one. I am able to help on many different levels. What can I do for you?

Business Setup

Business Setup

There are many foreigners who decide to setup a business in Thailand but donâ€™t know exactly what to do. I am here to help you go through the whole process from start to finish. I know exactly what needs to be done every step of the way and make sure everything runs smoothly. I have a lot of experience in dealing with lawyers and government officials especially in real estate industry.

Social Media Management

×

Social Media Management

Nowadays social media is a very important part of any business. I am here to make sure your social media marketing is on point. From setting up social media accounts like Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest to create original content and graphics for blogs and social media.

And much more!

Get in touch today to find out how I can help you save time and gain peace of mind knowing you have a reliable partner keeping an eye on your business.
